meanings.definition: Showing an extremely high level of politeness or courtesy.
meanings.sent1: The superpolite gentleman held the door open for everyone.
meanings.sent2: She always speaks in a superpolite tone to show respect.
meanings.sent3: The superpolite waiter kept refilling our water glasses before we even took a sip.
meanings.sent4: Her superpolite behavior was like a warm blanket on a chilly day.
meanings.sent5: The superpolite receptionist greeted each visitor with a genuine smile.

meanings.definition: To act in an excessively polite manner.
meanings.sent1: He tends to superpolite around his boss to avoid any misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: She will superpolite her way through the meeting to make a good impression.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to superpolite their parents to get extra dessert.
meanings.sent4: The politician would superpolite his opponents during debates.
meanings.sent5: The robot was programmed to superpolite in all interactions with humans.
